android.widget.TextView.android:text: Any pages you bookmark will be listed here.

TextView.android:text: You can now read personal documents such as PDFs or ePub files using Google Play Books.
To get started, go to play.google.com from your computer and click My Books.

"It looks like you haven't added any books to your online account yet. To add books, touch the shop icon to start shopping on Google Play.
Happy reading,
The Google Play Books team"
